source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
[Code],
[Name],
[A_S_M_],
[Agent],
[ARM],
[Location Code],
[Route],
[Sales hierarchy code],
[Global Dimension 1 Code],
[Zone],
'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Salesperson_Purchaser]
UNION ALL

[Code],
[Name],
[A_S_M_],
